text_logic_form: The trapezoids $JKLM$ and $QRST$ are similar to each other.
The area of trapezoid $JKLM$ is $138$ square units.
The area of trapezoid $QRST$ is $5.52$ square units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The trapezoids $JKLM$ and $QRST$ are similar to each other.
The area of trapezoid $JKLM$ is $138$ square units.
The area of trapezoid $QRST$ is $5.52$ square units.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QT$ is $x$.
The length of the line $KJ$ is $5$.
line_instances: There are lines $JM$, $KJ$, $KL$, and $LM$, forming the trapezoid $JKLM$.
There are lines $QR$, $RS$, $ST$, and $TQ$, forming the trapezoid $QRST$.
